author: jsdelfino
msg: Add more fine grain debug options and remove overhead in debug log macros when logging is turned off.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Add scripts to configure multiple load balancers on a proxy server.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Detach Memcached and Pgsql from terminal when logging with a logger like Scribe. Add a Scribe status command.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Automatically reconnect to a Memcached server after a disconnection.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Support multiple Auth modules in a single server or proxy config. Minor fixes to the OAuth2 module to comply with the spec.
